did.abstract: Collection contains papers principally relating to the indebtedness of the firm of I. and F. Gorin. They concern the collection of debts, the purchase and shipment of supplies (especially tobacco), and a creditor firm (John Gill, Jr., and Co.). There is also a partnership agreement between Campbell, Joseph P. Brown and John M. Shirley, by which Campbell was to furnish the capital and buy the goods for Brown and Shirley, store operators in Russellville, Kentucky.
